intro: I am a Computer Engineering student from University of Chile with a great passion for software development.
In this web portfolio, I share some of my projects and skills in search of new opportunities to continue growing in my career.
about: I am a Computing Engineering student with a passion for Software Engineering focused on developing efficient and high-quality solutions. My experience includes working with both modern technologies and current industry standards, as well as with traditional and robust programming languages. I continuously seek to expand my knowledge in different areas of computing to integrate these aspects into a project and generate even better solutions.
I am seeking opportunities to develop my skills and expand my experience in a challenging and collaborative work environment.
